thread.section_title: Fastport Passport Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fastport Passport | fastportpassport.com
thread.title: Nicole R
thread.title_full: Fastport Passport reviewed by Nicole R

author: Nicole R
title: Nicole R
text: I was quite apprehensive about a last minute passport but Sam put me at ease quite quickly. She had called me to let me know my passport paperwork had finally arrived (a day later than it was supposed to) so we'd have to make some adjustments to my timeline and boy did she ever! Talked with her Monday after noon, passport in hand Wednesday morning! She was polite, calm, easy to talk to and work through the time issues. Thank you!!
